name: HotelDetective
0:
”Alexa open hotel detective”
”Alexa play hotel detective”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hotel detective
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

You are a renowned detective whose been summoned to the mystery hotel. Your mission? To find where that mysterious scream came from.

Choose a number, any number between 1 and 50, and brace yourself as the door swings open. Will you find the culprit – maybe a cheeky mouse or a prankster pirate – or will you stumble upon something even more outrageous?

You might burst into a room where someone's brushing their teeth, or perhaps you'll find a room filled with hungry chickens – in this topsy-turvy hotel, anything's possible! Every room has a unique, amusing surprise waiting just for you.

As you crack each case, the hotel grows, adding ten more rooms at each level, up to a mind-boggling total of 100 rooms. With each new level, you unlock more crazy characters and rooms.

Don’t forget your detective hat, and maybe a magnifying glass.

WARNING: This Hotel has some very strange guests.

This skill is supported on all Alexa enabled devices, and has awesome visuals and animations for devices with screens, as well as immersive audio to make you feel like you are a real detective.

If you launch this skill, it will ask you to connect to Mini Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
